item.trainmurdermystery.letter.hitlist.a: Thank you for eliminating the targets. We have no further requests at this moment.
item.trainmurdermystery.letter.hitlist.p: Thank you for taking this job. Please eliminate the following targets:
Please do so with the utmost discretion and do not get caught. Good luck.
P.S.: Don't forget to use your instinct [%s] and use the train's exterior to relocate.
item.umbra_express.master_key.tooltip: Use on any locked door to open it (no cooldown)
